topics.body:
Guys (and gals, I'm not sexist), I was at the pharmacy recently and a saw this small product with a picture of a naked woman strategically placing her arm around her cups (I don't like the "b" word). Of course, as a guy, I wondered what it was.

It was condoms.

After a put it back in slight disgust, I noticed that shelves around me were filled with condoms.

... Yeah...
